items.sentence: I\'m sure the police will catch the robber eventually.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom not to do that anymore.
I\'m the one who taught Tom how to play the saxophone.
I\'ve already explained this to you many times before.
I\'ve already paid back all the money that I owed Tom.
Tom considered leaving school, but decided against it.
I certainly hope you\'re planning to come to my party.
I\'m not sure if that was a good thing or a bad thing.
If you want me to help you, all you have to do is ask.
Is there anything special you want to do this weekend?
